metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7143 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Python Twisted 14.0 trustRoot is not respected in HTTP client

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7143` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-twisted - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-bin - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-core - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-lore - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-mail - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-names - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-news - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-runner - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-web - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-words - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
python-twisted-conch - 1:13.2.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

python3-twisted-experimental - 13.2.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: twisted package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '13.2.0-1ubuntu1').
twisted package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '13.2.0-1ubuntu1').
twisted-py3 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '13.2.0-1ubuntu1').
